Vendor Recipes

Essential vendor recipes for Path of Exile

Currency Recipes

Chromatic Orb

Ingredients:
Any item with 3 linked sockets of different colors (R-G-B)
Result:
1x

Jeweller's Orb

Ingredients:
Any item with 6 sockets
Result:
7x

Fusing Orb

Ingredients:
Any item with 6 linked sockets
Result:
20x

Orb of Alchemy

Ingredients:
3 of same base type rare items (different names)
Result:
1x

Orb of Chance

Ingredients:
3 of same base type magic items (different names)
Result:
1x

Orb of Augmentation

Ingredients:
3 of same base type normal items (different names)
Result:
1x

Equipment Recipes

Movement Speed Boots

Ingredients:
Normal + +
Result:
Magic boots with 10% increased Movement Speed

+1 Lightning Gems Weapon

Ingredients:
Normal + Topaz Ring +
Result:
Magic weapon with +1 to Level of Lightning Gems

+1 Cold Gems Weapon

Ingredients:
Normal + Sapphire Ring +
Result:
Magic weapon with +1 to Level of Cold Gems

+1 Fire Gems Weapon

Ingredients:
Normal + Ruby Ring +
Result:
Magic weapon with +1 to Level of Fire Gems

Life Flask

Ingredients:
3 Life Flasks of same base type
Result:
1 Life Flask of next tier

Mana Flask

Ingredients:
3 Mana Flasks of same base type
Result:
1 Mana Flask of next tier

Gem Recipes

Gem Level Up

Ingredients:
Gem + Orb of Fusing
Result:
Same gem at level 1 with 20% quality

Portal Gem

Ingredients:
Portal Scroll
Result:
Portal gem (from vendor)

Wisdom Gem

Ingredients:
Scroll of Wisdom
Result:
Wisdom gem (from vendor)

Flask Recipes

Iron Flask

Ingredients:
3 Life Flasks + Ruby Ring +
Result:
Magic Iron Flask with increased life recovery

Granite Flask

Ingredients:
3 Utility Flasks +
Result:
Granite Flask
